channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TX
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for TX

item.title: Report I-2024060071
item.description:
Report I-2024060071

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-10
  • City: FALLS CITY
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PENN TANK LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 50000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Vehicle was traveling south on US 181. Vehicle left the right side of the roadway due to inattention/distraction by the driver. Upon corrective action, vehicle rolled onto the passenger side and slid partially off the road. The roadway was partially blocked as a result of the crash. The tank trailer was damaged in three places resulting in a discharge of contents.
